== Elements ==

You can use the `bordercolor` attribute on the following elements:

  * [FrameElement <frame>]
  * [FramesetElement <frameset>]
  * [TableElement <table>]
  * [TdElement <td>]
  * [ThElement <th>]
  * [TrElement <tr>]
